about_the_game:
As the alliance's commander, you will run the world's most advanced military logistics hub and oversee the production and supply of weapons and ammunition to the front lines in Ukraine.

Time is of the essence! Ukraine will only be victorious if the coalition is strong and willing to provide it with the most effective, modern weaponry. Help Ukraine win in the shortest possible period of time, become a hero, and destroy Ukraine's enemy.

50% of our War in Ukraine DLC profits will be given to Ukrainian soldiers fighting on the frontlines.

NEW MAP


A brand-new map with the option to construct above ground.

MODERN WEAPONS


Support the Ukrainian Army by supplying technologically advanced military equipment.

content_descriptors.notes: The game includes various types of weapons

name: Project Wunderwaffe - War in Ukraine
short_description: Become a part of the alliance that supports the Ukrainian Army. Manage new-age weapon production and the largest modern military logistical hub. Build a strong coalition that will help Ukraine win in the shortest possible time.
supported_languages:
English*, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Traditional Chinese, Simplified Chinese, Japanese, Korean, Polish, Portuguese - Brazil, Russian, Turkish
*languages with full audio support
